HTMLDListElement.summary: The HTMLDListElement interface provides special properties (beyond those of the regular interface it also has available to it by inheritance) for manipulating definition list ({{HtmlElement("dl")}}) elements.

remarks.para: -The HTML element implementing this interface: dl

HTMLDListElementCompact.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The compact property of the interface indicates that spacing between list items should be reduced. The exact handling of the compact attribute is browser-specific. Instead of using this property, consider using CSS line-height instead.

remarks.para: It reflects the compact attribute of the dl element.
